column1: Urgently Hiring || US Ticket Selling (PPC Call) || Travel Sales
column2: Roles And Responsibility:- Provide Advice on best travel options available to meet customer needs. Liaise with potential Customer using CRM System and provide travel quotes. Handling queries through website and phone. Research and Recommend travel destinations to customers. Experience in Airline reservation- Amadeus GDS. Issue tickets, handle refunds and reissues on Amadeus GDS. Check queues and process Schedule changes. Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, travel Suppliers, and partners. Taking care of customer queries, feedback and complaints. Creating proposals, including ticketing quotes and Issuance. Create and Update Electronic records of clients. Developing and implementing strongest for increasing customer satisfaction. Developing strategies for marketing and promotion. Profile- Travel Sales Consultant.  US Ticket Selling. (PPC Call) Experience- Minimum 2 Year. Eligibility Criteria- Bachelor's Degree in Travel & Tourism or related field prefered. Salary- 35K to 55K Shift Time- 9:30pm to 6am 5 Days Working. Rotational Shift. Location- Noida Sector 62 Interested Candidates Share your Updated Resume to- way4services@gamil.com Call - 9971118670?&?7042310147

column1: Ticketing Executive
column2: B2B & B2C & Corporate Client Ticketing - International & Domestic                           Reservation, Ticket Issuance, Creation of PNR, Re-issuance,Cancellation, Refunds & Checking Queue on CRS.Working out on itineraries.                     Desired Candidate Profile                                     The Candidate should be able to read fare rules & penalty.                         Worked on CRS (Like Amadeus / Galileo) as well as Issuance of LCC                         A candidate who has handled independently International / Domestic Air Ticketing.                         Candidate must be from Travel background and experience in Ticketing.                          Good Call & E-mail etiquettes.                         Diploma course in Travel & Tourism/Hospitality with Minimum 2+ years of Experience.                         In addition to Air Ticket shall render assistance in Visa, Issue travel Insurance and Basic Knowledge of Tours.                         Handle queries on phone and emails and solving customer escalations.                         Good Geographical Knowledge i.e., City codes,Airport codes, Airline hub etc.                         Understanding of practices associated with reading defining and application of hub utilization, routing, and fare rules.                         IATA certification will be considered as added advantage.

column1: Ticketing Executive
column2: Role & responsibilities     Assist clients in planning and booking Domestic and International Air Tickets tailored to their preferences and budget. Provide exceptional customer service by offering personalized flight recommendations and addressing inquiries and concerns promptly. Stay updated on the latest travel trends, destinations, and industry regulations to provide accurate information to clients. Coordinate with airlines and other travel partners to ensure seamless travel experiences for clients. Handle booking modifications, cancellations, and other travel-related issues efficiently. Other Requirements: Bachelor's degree in hospitality management, tourism, or a related field. Proven experience as a Ticketing Executive with core knowledge of Softwares like Amadeus and Galileo, preferably specializing in international sectors. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Excellent knowledge of popular international travel routings to make the International tickets more efficiently and most quickly. Proficiency in travel booking software and reservation systems. Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment and multitask efficiently. Passion for travel and providing exceptional customer service. Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits
column11: Ticketing Executive, domestic ticketing, International Ticketing, Ticketing
